\SetAPI{J}
\section{audit.entity.defaultmode.active}
\label{configuration:AuditEntityDefaultmodeActive}
\ClearAPI
Defines the default behavior for entities for auditing. If set to "true" for all entities which are not annotated with \type{Audited} audit is automatically enabled, if set to false they are ignored during auditing. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.config.AuditConfigurationConstants.AuditedEntityDefaultModeActive}
